description: A dashboard tailored for artists, streamlining the management of commissions and requests. Utilizes Firebase for secure authentication, along with its database and storage solutions to efficiently organize collections and data.
A modern e-commerce platform for clothing, developed with React and Redux, featuring a fully integrated payment system via Stripe API for secure and seamless transactions.

A multipurpose discord bot built using Javascript and Node.js. Contains commands such as music streams, playlist creation, server moderation, server games, catering to a wide array of server functionalities and entertainment needs.
A classic asteroid game built using HTML canvas element and vanilla Javascript
